Adjust the sensitivity of the microphone.

LEGAL WARNING 


To comply with the provisions of Articles 9 and 10 of Law 34/2002 of July 11th, Information Society and Electronic Commerce Services, presented below is the general information of this website: 


-Holder: RISING S.C.P. 
 -Address: Princesa Tenesoya street, number 75, 35118, Cruce de Arinaga, Agüimes, Las Palmas. 
 -E-Mail: info@rising.es 
 -VAT: J76167253 


TERMS OF USE 


1. ACKNOWLEDGMENT AND ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS OF SERVICE 


1.1 RISING SCP (hereinafter RISING), spanish company with business address in Princesa Tenesoya street, number 75, 35118, Cruce de Arinaga, Agüimes, Las Palmas, Spain and VAT J76167253 is owner of the products and services offered through the website scores.rising.es (hereinafter the SERVICES). 


1.2 SERVICES are provided to the user under the terms and conditions of this Agreement of Terms and Conditions of the SERVICES and in accordance with the rules and regulations published periodically by RISING. This terms govern the contractual relationship between RISING and customers. 


1.3 RISING is empowered to modify at any time the Terms of Use. Likewise, clients will be communicated about the changes that occur in the Terms of use by notice that will be published in the blog of the company (rising.es/ blog, hereinafter BLOG). The customer has the opportunity to object to these changes (eg by letter or email) within six weeks after the publication of the notice, without declaring their motives. If the customer does not object to these changes within this period, shall be deemed to have consented. RISING will specifically inform the client of the result of the modification notice. 


1.4 The use of whatever products or services offered through scores.rising.es (hereinafter the WEB or PLATFORM) implies the acceptance of these terms and conditions. These general conditions are applicable to purchases of products by consumers. 


1.5 This document represents the entire agreement between the user and RISING and supersedes any previous agreement signed by the parties regarding the subject of this contract. 


2. CELEBRATION OF CONTRACT 


The contractual relationship with RISING regarding the use of the web is confirmed with the acknowledgement by RISING of the sign up in the PLATFORM as a client or beta tester of the application provided by the WEB(hereafter the APPLICATION), producing full effect since then. Similarly, the relationship is also confirmed by downloading the APPLICATION, even if the user has not been identified or registered in the PLATFORM. This APPLICATION download confirms the contractual relationship with RISING regarding the use of the APPLICATION. 


3. SERVICES DESCRIPTION 


3.1. WEB DESCRIPTION 


The WEB provides the user with a variety of information, made available by RISING, and also provides the following services: 


A link that takes the user to the download page of the APPLICATION.
 A form whereby the user can create a beta tester account that allows access to the APPLICATION. 
 A form whereby the user can contact Rising. 


The provision of the PLATAFORM services listed above is free of charge. 


3.1.1. LINK TO DOWNLOAD PAGE 


3.1.1.1. RISING offers in its WEB a link that allows the user to access the download page of the APPLICATION, with no restrictions in the process. 


3.1.1.2. The APPLICATION\’s download page is hosted on third party servers. Therefore, RISING is not responsible for technical failures or incompatibilities that may result from this circumstance. 


3.1.2. SIGN UP FORM AS BETA TESTER 


3.1.2.1. RISING offers in its WEB a form that allows users to create an account on the WEB as a beta tester. This beta tester account allows exclusive access to the APPLICATION. 


3.1.2.2. User registered as beta testers users accessing the APPLICATION contract commitment to inform RISING about all bugs they discover during use. They may also send suggestions or opinions on those aspects of the APPLICATION consider that can be added, modified or deleted to enhance your user experience. To do this, they may use the contact form available on the website or send an email to info@rising.es. 


3.1.2.3. Beta testers, when contacting RISING, are required to submit accurate information on the outcome of the user experience. Not fulfilling this request may result in the elimination of the beta tester account. 


3.1.3. CONTACT FORM 


RISING offers in its WEB a form that allows users contact to RISING. To do so, the user must provide his name and email. This form is available to users so they can send RISING any question, suggestion, comment, complaint or any other necessary communication. 


3.2. APPLICATION DESCRIPTION 


3.2.1. ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS OF USE 


When installing the application, the user accepts these terms of use. 


3.2.2. DEFINITION 


3.2.2.1. La APLICACIÓN ofrece al usuario el acceso a una tienda online (en adelante, la TIENDA) desde la cual el usuario podrá adquirir las partituras existentes en el catálogo ofrecido por RISING. El usuario podrá descargar en su dispositivo las partituras que haya adquirido y las podrá utilizar de dos formas posibles: moviéndolas manualmente o automáticamente, ya sea seleccionando una velocidad de metrónomo o bien usando el micrófono del dispositivo. 


3.2.2.2. The APPLICATION is distributed for free. In addition, RISING will publish periodic updates ot the APPLICATION that will not accrue any cost to the user. 


3.2.3. DATA PROTECTION 


Any personal information provided to RISING while using the APPLICATION will only be used in accordance with the privacy policy statement of RISING. 


3.2.4. MICROPHONE USE 


The use of the microphone is limited exclusively for the purpose of moving automatically the scores that the musician is using. RISING, in no way whatsoever and under no circumstances, will use the microphone to collect personal information. 


3.2.5. LICENSE AND COPYRIGHT 


3.2.5.1. All trademarks, copyrights, databases and other intellectual property rights of the APPLICATION, whatever its nature, as well as the source code, are property of RISING.


3.2.5.2. Hereby RISING offers a revocable, free, nonexclusive and international licence to use this APPLICATION on a personal or professional level within the limits set by these conditions. 


3.2.6. COPYRIGHT 


3.2.6.1. RISING does not own copyright of any of the scores sold through the STORE. All copyrights of these scores belong to their respective authors and publishers.


3.2.6.2. The price that RISING applies to scores that are marketed in their STORE corresponds to RISING's work invested in digitizing the scores and adding them to the store. Under no circumstances RISING will receive any remuneration for copyrights belonging to scores that are not owned by RISING. 


3.2.7. TERMS OF USE 


3.2.7.1. The user will not act or allow third parties acting on their behalf to: 


-Make and distribute copies of the APPLICATION. 
 -Attempting to copy, reproduce, alter, modify, reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, transfer, exchange or translate APPLICATION.
 -Create any kind of project derived from the APPLICATION.


3.2.7.2. The APPLICATION is provided to the user for free, for personal and not commercial use. RISING keeps the right to modify or disable the APPLICATION any time with the purpose of protecting it against the actions listed in the previous section.


3.2.7.3. The user agrees that the terms of the agreement with the vendor of his mobile network ('Mobile Service Provider') will continue to apply for the use of the APPLICATION. Accordingly, it is possible that the Supplier may charge for Mobile Services connection to the network while the APPLICATION remains connected to the network, or that third party economic charges are produced. The user accepts the responsibility of charges that may arise. 


3.2.7.4. If the user is not the owner's billing phone or mobile device used to access the APPLICATION, it will be assumed that you have permission from the owner to use the APPLICATION. 


3.2.8. AVAILABILITY 


3.2.8.1. The application is available for mobile handheld devices operating with Android OS operating systems. RISING will make all reasonable efforts so the APPLICATION is available at all times. However, the user accepts that the APPLICATION delivery will be made through internet and mobile networks and, therefore, the quality and availability of the APPLICATION can be affected by factors beyond the responsible control of RISING. 


3.2.8.2. To use the APPLICATION, the user must have a compatible mobile device with internet access and meets the minimum specifications ('Software Requirements'). 


3.2.8.3. Los requisitos del software son los siguientes: Dispositivos Android OS con los sistemas operativos Android OS 4.1 a OS 4.4. Idiomas: español e inglés. En dispositivos con lenguaje no soportado por la aplicación, ésta se mostrará en inglés. 


3.2.9. ACCOUNT DELETING 


3.2.9.1. The user is permitted to terminate his account at any time through the tool offered in the APPLICATION for this purpose, and without notifying RISING. 


3.2.9.2. The account deletion by the user is an irreversible process that results in the removal of all user information contained in the RISING database. This information includes the record of purchases made by the user in the STORE. 


3.2.9.3. The account deletion by the user results in loss of the balance accumulated in his account and the scores that were downloaded in his device, as well as the end of their contractual relationship with RISING.


3.2.10. FINALIZATION 


3.2.10.1. RISING may terminate the use of the APPLICATION at any time, previous notice, which will be published on the BLOG. 


3.2.10.2. In case of this termination, RISING will refund all the money invested in the APPLICATION by the user. If the economical circumstances of RISING could not allow this full refund, RISING will refund as much as possible. 


3.2.10.3. At the end of such use, all rights and licenses granted to the user will also be terminated. 


4. INTELLECTUAL AND INDUSTRIAL PROPERTY 


4.1. Intellectual and industrial property on the web, graphic design and computer codes, as well as trade names, trademarks and logos are owned by RISING unless stated therein that the property of another.


4.2. Any reproduction, distribution, commercialization or transformation of the contents that are not expressly authorized by the owners, is a violation of the rights of intellectual property protected by law. 


5. CONTENT AND PROPER USE 


5.1. RISING ensures that all content and services offered on the WEB respect the principle of human dignity, the principle of non-discrimination based on race, sex, religion, nationality, disability or any other personal or social circumstance and the principle of the protection of youth and childhood. 


5.2. Also, the user undertakes to make proper use of the contents and services of the WEB, which can never be used for illegal purposes, or which may be contrary to public policy, national defense or public health. Any use by the USER of content and services must respect the principles of the previous paragraph.


6. PERSONAL DATA PROTECT 


6.1. RISING guarantees the security and confidentiality of the data provided by the user, in compliance with the provisions of Law 15/1999 of December 13, Protection of Personal Data, and in accordance with the commitment it undertakes to apply its Privacy Policy. 


6.2. The data provided by the user in the course of browsing, form filling and use of the WEB will be incorporated into a file responsibility of RISING, residing at Princesa Tenesoya street, number 75, 35118, Cruce de Arinaga, Agüimes, Las Palmas, Gran Canaria, Canary Islands, Spain, who deal directly or through the manager to be appointed under the laws and regulations and with the purpose of information, statistical and marketing as well as for carrying out promotional and advertising activities by any means, including by electronic means (including SMS, MMS, etc..) of the products offered on the website or by other companies of RISING, which may be of interest to the user to expand and improve products of RISING. 


6.3. All details about the nature and scope of the data collected and stored and its use can be read in the privacy policy statement and data protection.


7. DURATION AND TERMINATION 


7.1. The provision of services of the PLATFORM and the APPLICATION is indefinite. RISING, however, is entitled to terminate, suspend or terminate unilaterally at any time and without notice, the service of the APPLICATION or any of the SERVICES. 


7.2. In case of termination of the services provided by the APPLICATION, RISING will refund all the money invested in the APPLICATION by the user. If the economical circumstances of RISING could not allow this full refund, RISING will refund as much as possible. 


7.3. The condition of registered user in the provided services through the PLATFORM or the APPLICATION involves the creation of a special contractual link between the user and RISING running indefinitely, so that either party may terminate the same in any time without notice by notice in writing or by email or through the tools made available in the PLATFORM for this purpose. 


7.4. RISING keeps the right to temporarily access the usage record, in order to identify evidence of misuse in the PLATFORM or the APPLICATION. RISING can temporarily or permanently disable the user's account and therefore the contractual relationship, in the following cases: 


-When the data provided in the registration are false or incomplete.
 -Duplicated accounts registered by the same user.
 -Excessive and unusual use of the SERVICES entailing disproportionate costs for the user.
 -Improper use of the PLATFORM, the APPLICATION or any of its SERVICES.
 -Violation of these provisions in the terms and conditions.
 -When the statutory rights or rights of others are violated or infringed.
 -For any legitimate interest of RISING in general and, in particular, to protect the rights of other users.


8.JURISDICTION AND LAW 


8.1 These Terms of Use shall be governed by the provisions of Spanish legislation.

8.2 In the case that any discrepancy or dispute arising from the interpretation or application of these Terms of Use, RISING and the CLIENT expressly waiving any other jurisdiction that may apply, subject to the jurisdiction of the Courts and Tribunals of RISING\’s address. And in the event that the USER resides outside of Spain, RISING and the USER, expressly waiving any other jurisdiction that may apply, subject to the jurisdiction of the Courts of Las Palmas.


8.3 In the event of a misunderstanding caused by translation of these Terms of Use or any other document of the WEB occur prevail at all times the original document, in this case written in Spanish.

With the following statement, RISING S.C.P. (hereinafter, RISING), with business address in Princesa Tenesoya street, number 75, 35118, Cruce de Arinaga, Agüimes, Las Palmas, Spain, exposes its Privacy Policy to the customers and users of the website scores.rising.es, so the users can freely determine whether they want to provide RISING with the personal data required by any means in relation to a subscription request, register or when filling any online forms. 


What information do we collect? 

We collect information from you when you fill out the register form to create a beta tester account. Specifically, your email address, a name for your account (which does not have to be your real name) and a password. 


When contacting us through our site, as appropriate, you may be asked to enter your: e-mail address. You may, however, visit our site anonymously.


What do we use your information for?

Any of the information we collect from you may be used in one of the following ways: 


- To process transactions. 

- When contacting us, to be able to answer you.

Your information, whether public or private, will not be sold, exchanged, transferred, or given to any other company for any reason whatsoever, without your consent, other than for the express purpose of delivering the purchased product or service requested. 


How do we protect your information? 

We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you enter, submit, or access your personal information.


All supplied sensitive/credit information is transmitted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology and then encrypted into our Payment gateway providers database only to be accessible by those authorized with special access rights to such systems, and are required to keep the information confidential. 


After a transaction, your private information (credit cards, social security numbers, financials, etc.) will not be stored on our servers. 


Do we use cookies? 

We do not use cookies.


Do we disclose any information to outside parties? 

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. However, we may release your information when we believe it is appropriate to comply with the law or protect ours or others rights, property, or safety. 


Terms and Conditions 

You can also visit our Terms and Conditions on our webpage rising.es. 


Your consent 

By using our site, you consent to this privacy policy.


Changes to our Privacy Policy 

If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will notify you via our blog. 


Contacting Us

If there are any questions regarding this privacy policy you may contact us using the information below:


Email: info@rising.es
